name: Push Hands
description: A sensitivity training exercise to develop balance, coordination, and energy flow.

cards.title: Basic Push Hands
cards.description: A foundational Tai Chi drill that teaches sensitivity and redirection.
bulletpoints: Maintain a relaxed posture and stable stance
Use circular hand movements to redirect energy
Focus on feeling the opponent's force rather than resisting it

cards.title: Single-Hand Push Hands Drill
cards.description: A variation that isolates one hand to refine coordination and control.
bulletpoints: Focus on using one hand to maintain contact
Use breath control to enhance relaxation and fluidity
